mobeffects.modname.tooltip: 透過聲音和視覺效果增強玩家和生物。
mobeffects.cfg.logging.tooltip: 定義日誌記錄的行為方式
mobeffects.cfg.logging.EnableDebug.toolt: 啟用/停用模組的除錯日誌
mobeffects.cfg.logging.FlagMask.tooltip: Bitmask for toggling various debug traces
mobeffects.cfg.footsteps.tooltip: 定義腳步聲效果生成參數
mobeffects.cfg.footsteps.SoundEnable.too: 啟用用原聲版本替換腳步聲
mobeffects.cfg.footsteps.PlayerStyle: Style of footprint to display for a player
mobeffects.cfg.footsteps.ArmorAccents.to: Enable armor rustle accents for footstep acoustics
mobeffects.cfg.footsteps.RainSplashAccen: Enable rain splash accents for footstep acoustics
mobeffects.cfg.footsteps.WaterLoggedAcce: Enable water logged accents for footstep acoustics
mobeffects.cfg.effects.PotionParticles.t: Hides the player's potion particles to avoid cluttering display
mobeffects.cfg.effects.Breath.tooltip: Show breath effect in cold regions and underwater
mobeffects.cfg.effects.Arrow.tooltip: Show arrow particle trail during flight
